messages.content: Bob and Bill are always happy to spend time together. One day, Bob sees Bill walking in the park. Bob waves at Bill, but Bill doesn't notice. Bob immediately remembers a fact about Bill and then feels very silly. What did Bob remember?
It is not clear what fact Bob remembered about Bill that made him feel silly. Could you provide more context or clarify the situation?
Please give your best guess based on the context provided.

Without any additional context, it is difficult to accurately guess what fact Bob remembered about Bill that made him feel silly. However, it is possible that Bob remembered a personal or embarrassing detail about Bill that he had previously shared with him, and felt embarrassed that he had forgotten it or that it had come to mind unintentionally.
